inclusion.criterion: understand and voluntarily sign an informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age >=18 years at the time of signing the informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to adhere to the study visit schedule and other protocol requirements
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Confirmed diagnosis of AL amyloidosis (see appendix 3)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Need for treatment in the judgment of their treating physician
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Evaluable or measurable disease defined by any of the following:
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Measurable serum free light chains >= 10 mg/dL, kappa or lambda, provided
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Monoclonal protein in the serum >= 1 g/dL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Laboratory test results within these ranges:
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with symptomatic multiple myeloma with asymptomatic biopsy confirmed AL amyloidosis (Appendix 3)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant or breast feeding females. (Lactating females must agree not to breast feed while taking lenalidomide).
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with systemic amyloidosis and is on hemodialysis for ESRD.
